TopicTitle: Updated Leopard 2A7 - Now with more 7-slope and a shorter turret

Articles.Content:
![PDFKOa7.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/PDFKOa7.jpg)

Just make sure that the turret doesn't get stuck to the chassis when you're staging it. Otherwise, I just made the turret really short so that I could add more modules to the back for future releases.
